method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Tint.

parameter.name: baseColor
parameter.shortdesc: The color that the tint is based upon.

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Tint &#40;Optional)

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Tint with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Tint with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Tint with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Tints within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The Tint, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Tint, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The Tint, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Tint, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Tint in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Tint in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Tint in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Tint with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the Tint that follows the desired Tint.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Tint whose index follows the specified Tint in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The Tint whose index comes before the desired Tint.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Tint in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Tint in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Tint.
Returns the Tint with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
